ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( MHS_Confirmed_Rate__c >= MHS_Published_Rate__c || ISBLANK( MHS_Confirmed_Rate__c ) || MHS_Confirmed_Rate__c = 0 ) && ISPICKVAL( MHS_Status__c , 'Reduction' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When the MHS Status is Reduction the value in the MHS Confirmed Rate must be less than the value in the MHS Published Rate but greater than zero.
